description: Decimal expansion of Otter's rooted tree constant: lim_{n->inf} A000081(n+1)/A000081(n).
comments: A000055(n) ~ A086308 * A051491^n * n^(-5/2), A000081(n) ~ A187770 * A051491^n * n^(-3/2). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 04 2013Analytic Combinatorics (Flajolet and Sedgewick, 2009, p. 481) has a wrong value of this constant (2.9955765856). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 04 2013
references: S. R. Finch, Mathematical Constants, Cambridge, 2003, pp. 295-316.
links: S. R. Finch, Otter's Tree Enumeration Constants [Broken link]
P. Flajolet and R. Sedgewick, Analytic Combinatorics, 2009, p. 481
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Rooted Tree
Index entries for sequences related to trees
Index entries for sequences related to rooted trees
mathematica: digits = 99; max = 250; s[n_, k_] := s[n, k] = a[n+1-k] + If[n < 2*k, 0, s[n-k, k]]; a[1] = 1; a[n_] := a[n] = Sum[a[k]*s[n-1, k]*k, {k, 1, n-1}]/(n-1); A[x_] := Sum[a[k]*x^k, {k, 0, max}]; eq = Log[c] == 1+Sum[A[c^-k]/k, {k, 2, max}]; alpha = c /. FindRoot[eq, {c, 3}, WorkingPrecision -> digits+5]; RealDigits[alpha, 10, digits] // First (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Sep 24 2014 *)
author: _David Broadhurst_
